text:
Budget Amendment Form
Amendment Labour Group’s Alternative Budget Amendment 1
Name: Number:
Directorate: All
Proposer: Mr Alister Brady Seconder: Mrs Jackie Meade
Proposed Purpose:
To amend the budget proposed by the Administration in line with the Labour Group’s Alternative Budget in accordance
with sections 8.10 – 14 of the Constitution.
Proposed Amount Proposed Funding Source:
See revised budget appendices D and F.
